long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This is a lightweight Chrome extension that will let you screenshot anything you see on your screen, so you can do any of the following on your screen capture:

â˜‘ï¸  Write text
â˜‘ï¸  Crop
â˜‘ï¸  Use arrows
â˜‘ï¸  Pixelate sensitive information 
â˜‘ï¸  Include rectangular boxes or lines
â˜‘ï¸  Get a link of your marked up image to send to anyone!
â˜‘ï¸  Share and collaborate on screenshots
â˜‘ï¸  Full Gmail email message and email conversation screenshots 
â˜‘ï¸  Forward email messages or email conversations as screenshots 
â˜‘ï¸  Save screenshots to Google Drive, Dropbox, Box
â˜‘ï¸  Save screenshots as PDF

This is an excellent communication tool for any graphic designers, remote teams, project leaders, and more! 

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

Website: https://www.screenshot-tool.com/
cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net
Pricing: FREE
